name: Berkshire Aviation Enterprises LLC.
about: Berkshire Aviation Enterprises LLC, located at the Great Barrington Airport, has been a cornerstone of aviation training for over 65 years. Known for its personal and friendly atmosphere, the school offers comprehensive flight training, scenic flights, and maintenance services. With a fleet of meticulously maintained Piper aircraft, students can pursue various certifications, including private pilot licenses and instrument ratings. The school is committed to making flying enjoyable and safe, with experienced instructors and a state-of-the-art maintenance shop. Berkshire Aviation is also affiliated with the Berkshire School's Aviation Science program, providing students with both ground school and flight training. Whether you're a novice or an experienced pilot, Berkshire Aviation Enterprises is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
